entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Moosonee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:17 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Moosonee Airport 05:29 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -12.6°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -14.9°C
Wind: NNE 28 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
